column2: HS200 - 05BR Brand New House for Sale in Pannipitiya
column6: This newly built, beautiful three story house located in Pannipitya is the perfect home for any family. Completed with 5 spacious bedrooms, 3 bathrooms with hot water the house comes with an outdoor garden and parking space for 2 vehicles within the premises. The entire house is very well ventilated with plenty of natural light coming in to the house through wide windows. Balconies that run around the rooms and living room makes the atmosphere very relaxing. The surrounding area is very quiet and peace with safe neighbourhood. There are two spacious living areas on the first floor and the second floor. There is a maid's toilet, small back yard and a large balcony with a view of the surrounding area. Additionally, all interior in the house (pantry cupboards, stair case, and ceiling) is built from Mahogany-wood and the exterior from Jack-wood (Doors and windows). It has a 1000L water tank and AKEA toilet fittings in all bathrooms.
